page.title: 05Health
page.content: There are two surgeries and one clinic in our area.They are all quite big and all near each other.There are several district nurses who go around every day visiting people. Our area is very tidy and the atmosphere is healthy.There are no hospitals.There are a lot of old people who live in small cottages.Each day the district nurses have to nurse about ten patients.Some of them take little time and are easy to nurse, but some take more than half an hour.Sometimes some of the nurses have to work in the weekends.Some of the nurses get a free car if they want it.The district nurses have a radio control in their cars so they can call each other up.When you are a district nurse you can choose to work either full-time or part-time. by Emma Tompkins
